		FROM = {
			faction_succ_gavelkind = { # The target (title) of the faction
				succession = gavelkind
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8000"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = strong
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = brave
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_succ_gavelkind
						power = 1.5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_succ_gavelkind
						power = 1.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_succ_gavelkind
						power = 2.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_succ_gavelkind
						power = 3.0
					}
				}
			}	
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_succ_gavelkind
						power = 4.0
					}
				}
			}	
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { faction_power = { faction = faction_succ_gavelkind power = 1.0 } }
				}
				random = {
					chance = 25
					character_event = { id = 45002 days = 120 } # Loyalists flock to the liege's banner
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 8116 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8100" }
			tooltip = {
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_succ_gavelkind
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_succ_gavelkind power = 0.75 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = {
						}
						30 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						faction_power = { faction = faction_succ_gavelkind power = 0.75 }
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_succ_gavelkind power = 1.5 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						75 = {
						}
						5 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ultimatum - crown authority
letter_event = {
	id = 8025
	desc = EVTDESC8025
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		FROM = { in_faction = faction_lower_crown_authority }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = { 
			diplomatic_immunity = yes 
			any_faction_backer = {
				faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA8000
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0			
				NOT = {
					FROM = {
						faction_power = 
						{
							faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
							power = 1.0
						}
					}
				}
			}			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = weak
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = craven
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = charitable
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = content
			}
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_vassal = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOT = { in_faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
 }
				}
				character_event = { id = 8094 }
			}
			FROM = {
				letter_event = { id = 8067 }
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
					letter_event = { id = 8095 }
					diplomatic_immunity = no
				}
				diplomatic_immunity = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			faction_lower_crown_authority = { # The target (title) of the faction
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = crown_authority_1 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = crown_authority_0
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = crown_authority_2 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = crown_authority_1
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = crown_authority_3 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = crown_authority_2
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = crown_authority_4 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = crown_authority_3
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_lowered_crown_authority
				who = ROOT
				months = 12
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8000"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = strong
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = brave
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
						power = 1.5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
						power = 1.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
						power = 2.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
						power = 3.0
					}
				}
			}	
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
						power = 4.0
					}
				}
			}	
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { faction_power = { faction = faction_lower_crown_authority power = 1.0 } }
				}
				random = {
					chance = 25
					character_event = { id = 45002 days = 120 } # Loyalists flock to the liege's banner
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 8117 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8100" }
			tooltip = {
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_lower_crown_authority
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_lower_crown_authority power = 0.75 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = {
						}
						30 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						faction_power = { faction = faction_lower_crown_authority power = 0.75 }
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_lower_crown_authority power = 1.5 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						75 = {
						}
						5 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ultimatum - tribal organization
letter_event = {
	id = 8027
	desc = EVTDESC8027
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		FROM = { in_faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = { 
			diplomatic_immunity = yes 
			any_faction_backer = {
				faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA8000
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0			
				NOT = {
					FROM = {
						faction_power = 
						{
							faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
							power = 1.0
						}
					}
				}
			}			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = weak
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = craven
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = charitable
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = content
			}
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_vassal = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOT = { in_faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
 }
				}
				character_event = { id = 8028 }
			}
			FROM = {
				letter_event = { id = 8071 }
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
					letter_event = { id = 8029 }
					diplomatic_immunity = no
				}
				diplomatic_immunity = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			faction_lower_tribal_organization = { # The target (title) of the faction
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = tribal_organization_1 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = tribal_organization_0
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = tribal_organization_2 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = tribal_organization_1
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = tribal_organization_3 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = tribal_organization_2
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = tribal_organization_4 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = tribal_organization_3
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_lowered_tribal_organization
				who = ROOT
				months = 12
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8000"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = strong
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = brave
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
						power = 1.5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
						power = 1.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
						power = 2.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
						power = 3.0
					}
				}
			}	
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
						power = 4.0
					}
				}
			}	
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { faction_power = { faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization power = 1.0 } }
				}
				random = {
					chance = 25
					character_event = { id = 45002 days = 120 } # Loyalists flock to the liege's banner
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 8114 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8100" }
			tooltip = {
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization power = 0.75 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = {
						}
						30 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						faction_power = { faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization power = 0.75 }
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_lower_tribal_organization power = 1.5 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						75 = {
						}
						5 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

# Inform faction backer - tribal organization
letter_event = {
	id = 8029
	desc = "EVTDESC8029"
	
	show_from_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "GOOD"
		reverse_opinion = {
			modifier = opinion_grateful
			who = FROMFROM
			years = 5
		}
		
		add_character_modifier = {
			name = faction_lower_TO_ultimatum_timer
			hidden = yes
			duration = 3650
		}
	}
}

	}

# Ultimatum - gain a vassal title
letter_event = {
	id = 8030
	desc = EVTDESC8030
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA8000
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = weak
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = craven
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = charitable
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = content
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				letter_event = { id = 8068 }
				any_plot_backer = {
					letter_event = { id = 8096 }
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			plot_target_title = {
				usurp_title_plus_barony_if_unlanded = PREV
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB8000
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = strong
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = brave
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				FROM = { plot_power = 1.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = { plot_power = 2.0 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = { plot_power = 3.0 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = { plot_power = 4.0 }
			}	
		}
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 8118 days = 3 tooltip = EVTTOOLTIP8100 }
		}
	}
}

# Regent is in on the plot - Crown Authority
letter_event = {
	id = 8026
	desc = EVTDESC8026
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA8026
		hidden_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				letter_event = { id = 8067 }
				any_plot_backer = {
					letter_event = { id = 8095 }
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			crownlaw_title = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = crown_authority_1 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = crown_authority_0
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = crown_authority_2 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = crown_authority_1
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = crown_authority_3 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = crown_authority_2
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = crown_authority_4 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = crown_authority_3
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_lowered_crown_authority
				who = ROOT
				months = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ultimatum - Independence
letter_event = {
	id = 8035
	desc = "EVTDESC8035"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		FROM = { in_faction = faction_independence }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = { 
			diplomatic_immunity = yes 
			any_faction_backer = {
				faction = faction_independence
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8000" # Fold to demand
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0			
				NOT = {
					FROM = {
						faction_power = 
						{
							faction = faction_independence
							power = 1.0
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = weak
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = craven
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = charitable
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.001
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						faction_power = 
						{
							faction = faction_independence
							power = 0.25
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_vassal = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOT = { in_faction = faction_independence }
				}
				character_event = { id = 8093 }
			}
			FROM = {
				letter_event = { id = 8069 }
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_independence
					letter_event = { id = 8097 }
					diplomatic_immunity = no
				}
				diplomatic_immunity = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			any_faction_backer = {
				faction = faction_independence
				set_defacto_liege = THIS
			}
			set_defacto_liege = THIS
		}
		
		FROM = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_granted_independence
				who = ROOT
				months = 120
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8000" # War!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = strong
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = brave
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_independence
						power = 1.5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_independence
						power = 1.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_independence
						power = 2.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_independence
						power = 3.0
					}
				}
			}	
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_independence
						power = 4.0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { faction_power = { faction = faction_independence power = 1.0 } }
				}
				random = {
					chance = 25
					character_event = { id = 45002 days = 120 } # Loyalists flock to the liege's banner
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 8119 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8100" }
			tooltip = {
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_independence
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						faction_power = { faction = faction_independence power = 0.33 }
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_independence power = 0.75 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = {
						}
						15 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						35 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						faction_power = { faction = faction_independence power = 0.75 }
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_independence power = 1.5 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						75 = {
						}
						5 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ultimatum - Install Pretender
letter_event = {
	id = 8036
	desc = "EVTDESC8036"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		FROM = { in_faction = faction_claimant }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = { 
			diplomatic_immunity = yes 
			any_faction_backer = {
				faction = faction_claimant
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA8000 # Give in
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0			
				NOT = {
					FROM = {
						faction_power = 
						{
							faction = faction_claimant
							power = 1.0
						}
					}
				}
			}			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.001
				has_nickname = nick_the_conqueror
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = weak
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = craven
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = charitable
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = content
			}
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_vassal = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOT = { in_faction = faction_claimant }
				}
				character_event = { id = 8099 }
			}
			FROM = {
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_claimant
					letter_event = { id = 8098 }
					diplomatic_immunity = no
				}
				letter_event = { id = 8061 }
				diplomatic_immunity = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8000"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = strong
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = brave
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_claimant
						power = 1.5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_claimant
						power = 1.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_claimant
						power = 2.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_claimant
						power = 3.0
					}
				}
			}	
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_claimant
						power = 4.0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { faction_power = { faction = faction_claimant power = 1.0 } }
				}
				random = {
					chance = 25
					character_event = { id = 45002 days = 120 } # Loyalists flock to the liege's banner
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 8111 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8100" }
			tooltip = {
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_claimant
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_claimant power = 0.75 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = {
						}
						30 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						faction_power = { faction = faction_claimant power = 0.75 }
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_claimant power = 1.5 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						75 = {
						}
						5 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Demand accepted - seniority

	id = 8055
	desc = "EVTDESC8055"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		clr_character_flag = faction_succ_seniority_ultimatum_taken
		add_character_modifier = {
			name = faction_succ_seniority_ultimatum_timer
			hidden = yes
			duration = 3650
		}
	}
}

	desc = "EVTDESC8060"

# Demand accepted - Install Claimant
letter_event = {
	id = 8061
	desc = "EVTDESC8061"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		supported_claimant = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_very_grateful
				who = ROOT
				years = 10
			}
			reverse_opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_fought_for_claimant
				who = ROOT
				years = 20
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		clr_character_flag = faction_claimant_ultimatum_taken
		supported_claimant = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					prisoner = yes
					host = { character = FROM  }
				}
				prisoner = no
			}
			ROOT = {
				supported_claimant_title = {
					# If the claimant has the wrong government type, take care of that first.
					if = {
						limit = {
							higher_tier_than = PREVPREV
							holder_scope = {
								OR = {
									is_feudal = yes
									is_tribal = yes
									is_nomadic = yes
								}
							}
							ROOT = {
								supported_claimant = {
									is_ruler = yes
									OR = {
										is_theocracy = yes
										is_republic = yes
									}
								}
							}
						}
						ROOT = { supported_claimant = { abdicate = yes } }
					}
				
					usurp_title_plus_barony_if_unlanded_and_vassals_no_adj = { target = PREVPREV type = faction_demand }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Demand accepted - Independence
letter_event = {
	id = 8069
	desc = "EVTDESC8069"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				controls_religion = no
				higher_tier_than = BARON
				FROM = {
					OR = { # If the old liege can use the subjugation CB, give no claims
						NOT = { religion_group = pagan_group }
						NOT = { culture_group = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
			add_weak_pressed_claim = FROM
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		clr_character_flag = faction_independence_ultimatum_taken
	}
}

### Demand rejected events

# Demand rejected - gain a title
letter_event = {
	id = 8100
	desc = "EVTDESC8100"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8100"
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		hidden_tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		plot_target_title = {
			reverse_war = {
				target = ROOT
				casus_belli = claim_on_liege_plot
				plot_backers = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8100"
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		prestige = -100
		any_plot_backer = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_coward
				who = ROOT
				years = 5
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				letter_event = { id = 8120 }
			}
		}
		cancel_plot = plot_gain_title
	}
}

# Demand rejected - seniority
letter_event = {
	id = 8105
	desc = "EVTDESC8100"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8100"
		
		clr_character_flag = faction_succ_seniority_ultimatum_taken
		faction_succ_seniority = { # The target (title) of the faction
			reverse_war = {
				target = ROOT
				casus_belli = change_seniority_succession_law
				faction = faction_succ_seniority
			}
		}
	}
}

# Demand rejected - primogeniture
letter_event = {
	id = 8110
	desc = "EVTDESC8100"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

			}

# Demand rejected - Install Claimant
letter_event = {
	id = 8111
	desc = "EVTDESC8100"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		supported_claimant = {
			reverse_opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_fought_for_claimant
				who = ROOT
				years = 20
			}
		}
		any_faction_backer = {
			faction = faction_claimant
			supported_claimant = {
				reverse_opinion = {
					modifier = opinion_fought_for_claimant
					who = PREV
					years = 20
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8100"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				supported_claimant = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			faction_claimant = { # The target (title) of the faction
				reverse_war = {
					target = ROOT
					casus_belli = claim_on_liege
					faction = faction_claimant
				}
			}
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					supported_claimant = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			faction_claimant = { # The target (title) of the faction
				reverse_war = {
					target = ROOT
					casus_belli = other_claim_on_liege
					faction = faction_claimant
				}
			}
		}
		
		clr_character_flag = faction_claimant_ultimatum_taken
		
	}
}

# Demand rejected - gain a vassal title
letter_event = {
	id = 8118
	desc = "EVTDESC8118"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8118"
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		hidden_tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		plot_target_title = {
			reverse_war = {
				target = ROOT
				casus_belli = claim_on_vassal_plot
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8118"
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		prestige = -100
		any_plot_backer = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_coward
				who = ROOT
				years = 5
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				letter_event = { id = 8120 }
			}
		}
		cancel_plot = plot_gain_vassal_title
	}
}

		}
	}

# Inform vassal - plot is abandoned
letter_event = {
	id = 8120
	desc = "EVTDESC8120"
	
	show_from_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_tooltip = {
			remove_opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_coward
				who = FROM
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8120"
		opinion = {
			modifier = opinion_coward
			who = FROM
			years = 5
		}
	}
}

### Murder Plot Events ###
#
# 8150-8299

# POISONED WINE - ADULTS ONLY

# The plotter sees an opportunity - Poisoned Wine
character_event = {
	id = 8150
	desc = "EVTDESC8150"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_plot = plot_kill_character
			has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
		}
		plot_target_char = {
			age = 16
			prisoner = no
			at_location = ROOT # The Plot Head needs to be at the target's location to get a chance
			NOT = { trait = incapable }
			NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
		plot_power_contribution = 
		{
			plotter = ROOT
			power = 0.025
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8400
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.10
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.20
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.30
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.40
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.50
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.60
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.70
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.80
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.90
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8150" # The conspirators provide the poison
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 1.0
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 8162 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8155 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8155" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8150" # Buy the poison
		trigger = {
			NOT = { plot_power = 0.5 }
			NOT = { learning = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 8162 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8155 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8155" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8150" # Buy the poison
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			NOT = { learning = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 8162 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8155 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8155" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC8150" # Hemlock goes well with the Red...
		tooltip_info = learning
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			learning = 10
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 8162 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8155 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8155" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { learning = 10 }
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
		}
	}
}

# A plot backer sees an opportunity - Poisoned Wine
character_event = {
	id = 8151
	desc = EVTDESC8151
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		any_backed_character = {
			OR = {
				has_plot = plot_kill_character
				has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
			}
			plot_power = 0.5
			plot_target_char = {
				age = 16
				prisoner = no
				NOT = { trait = incapable }
				NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			}
			NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
			ROOT = {
				plot_power_contribution = 
				{
					plotter = PREV
					power = 0.025
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 4200
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.10
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.20
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.30
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.40
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.60
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.70
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.80
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.90
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8150" # The conspirators provide the poison
		trigger = {
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
			character_event = { id = 8160 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8151" # Ask the Plotter for funds
		trigger = {
			NOT = { learning = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 8152 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8152" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8150" # Buy the poison
		trigger = {
			NOT = { learning = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 8160 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC8150" # Hemlock goes well with the Red...
		tooltip_info = learning
		trigger = {
			learning = 10
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
			character_event = { id = 8160 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { learning = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Poisoned Wine - Plot backer requests funds
character_event = {
	id = 8152
	desc = "EVTDESC8152"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8152"
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1.0
		}
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 8153 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8153" } }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8152"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 8154 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8154" } }
	}
}

# Poisoned Wine - plot backer receives funds
character_event = {
	id = 8153
	desc = "EVTDESC8153"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8155 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8155" } } }
	}
}

# Poisoned Wine - plot backer does NOT receive funds
character_event = {
	id = 8154
	desc = "EVTDESC8154"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8154" # Pay for it myself
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8155 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8155" } } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8154" # Screw this
		clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
	}
}

# Poisoned Wine - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 8155
	desc = EVTDESC8155
	picture = GFX_evt_feast
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		prisoner = no
		
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8155" # Drinks the wine
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = paranoid
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = temperate
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = gluttonous
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = temperate }
						NOT = { trait = gluttonous }
						NOT = { trait = paranoid }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 8163 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 8163 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 8156 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 8164 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 8164 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 8157 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8155" # Discovers the poison
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = paranoid
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = temperate
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = gluttonous
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = temperate }
					NOT = { trait = gluttonous }
					NOT = { trait = paranoid }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 8165 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 8165 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 8158 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 8166 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 8166 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 8159 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Poisoned Wine - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 8156
	desc = EVTDESC8156
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA8156
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

# Poisoned Wine - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 8157
	desc = "EVTDESC8157"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8157"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

# Poisoned Wine - Backer informs Plotter of plan

	id = 8160
	desc = "EVTDESC8160"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8160"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 8161 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8161" } }
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { character = FROM }
				}
				character_event = { id = 8162 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

		clear_event_target = target_victim
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8163"
	}
}

# Poisoned Wine - Notification: Failure, and discovered
character_event = {
	id = 8165
	desc = "EVTDESC8165"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 11 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			reveal_plot = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8165"
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
			tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		}
	}
}

# Poisoned Wine - Notification: Failure, but NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 8166
	desc = "EVTDESC8166"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
}


# FALLING ACCIDENT - CHILDREN ONLY

# Falling accident - The plotter sees an opportunity
character_event = {
	id = 8170
	desc = "EVTDESC8170"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_plot = plot_kill_character
			has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
		}
		plot_target_char = {
			age = 5
			NOT = { age = 16 }
			prisoner = no
			NOT = { trait = incapable }
			NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			at_location = ROOT # The Plot Head needs to be at the target's location to get a chance
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
		plot_power_contribution = 
		{
			plotter = ROOT
			power = 0.025
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3600
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.10
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.20
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.30
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.40
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.50
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.60
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.70
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.80
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.90
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8170" # The conspirators provide the poison
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 1.0
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 8182 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8175 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8175" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8170" # Bribe a Guard
		trigger = {
			NOT = { plot_power = 0.5 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 8182 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8175 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8175" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8170" # Bribe a Guard
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 8182 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8175 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8175" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC8170" # I know just the person for the job...
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			intrigue = 10
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 8182 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8175 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8175" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
		}
	}
}

# Falling Accident - A plot backer sees an opportunity
character_event = {
	id = 8171
	desc = "EVTDESC8171"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		any_backed_character = {
			OR = {
				has_plot = plot_kill_character
				has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
			}
			plot_power = 0.5
			plot_target_char = {
				age = 5
				NOT = { age = 16 }
				prisoner = no
				NOT = { trait = incapable }
				NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			}
			NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
			ROOT = {
				plot_power_contribution = 
				{
					plotter = PREV
					power = 0.025
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3600
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.10
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.20
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.30
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.40
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.60
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.70
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.80
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.90
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8170" # The conspirators provide a killer
		trigger = {
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
			character_event = { id = 8180 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8171" # Ask the Plotter for funds
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 8172 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8152" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8170" # Bribe a Guard
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 8180 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC8170" # I know just the person for the job...
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			intrigue = 10
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
			character_event = { id = 8180 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Falling Accident - Plot backer requests funds
character_event = {
	id = 8172
	desc = "EVTDESC8172"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8172"
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1.0
		}
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 8173 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8153" } }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8152"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 8174 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8154" } }
	}
}

# Falling Accident - plot backer receives funds
character_event = {
	id = 8173
	desc = "EVTDESC8173"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8175 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8175" } } }
	}
}

# Falling Accident - plot backer does NOT receive funds
character_event = {
	id = 8174
	desc = "EVTDESC8174"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8154" # Pay for it myself
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 8175 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8175" } } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8154" # Screw this
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
	}
}

# Falling Accident - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 8175
	desc = "EVTDESC8175"
	picture = GFX_evt_feast
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	trigger = {
		prisoner = no
		
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8175" # Falls
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = paranoid
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = trusting
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = paranoid }
						NOT = { trait = trusting }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 8183 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 8183 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 8176 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 8184 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 8184 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 8177 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8175" # Dodges
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = paranoid
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = trusting
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = trusting }
					NOT = { trait = paranoid }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 8185 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 8185 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 8178 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 8186 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 8186 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 8179 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Falling Accident - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 8176
	desc = "EVTDESC8176"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8176"
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
	
}

# Falling Accident - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 8177
	desc = "EVTDESC8176"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8177"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

# Falling Accident - Lives, murderer discovered

	id = 8178
	desc = "EVTDESC8178"
	picture = GFX_evt_scandal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8178"
	}
}

# Falling Accident - Lives, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 8179
	desc = "EVTDESC8179"
	picture = GFX_evt_scandal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8179"
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { trait = paranoid }
				NOT = { trait = trusting }
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = paranoid
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = trusting
			}
			random = {
				chance = 50
				remove_trait = trusting
			}
		}
	}
}

# Falling Accident - Backer informs Plotter of plan

	id = 8180

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8180"
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 8181 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8161" } }
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { character = FROM }
				}
				character_event = { id = 8182 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Falling Accident - Notification: Failure, and discovered
character_event = {
	id = 8185
	desc = "EVTDESC8185"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 11 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			reveal_plot = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8185"
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
			tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		}
	}
}

# Falling Accident - Notification: Failure, but NOT discovered

	id = 8186
	desc = "EVTDESC8186"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal

# Top Liege is approached by Plotter
letter_event = {
	id = 7500
	desc = "EVTDESC7500"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #Yes
		name = "EVTOPTA7500"
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 7501 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7501" }
		}
	}
	option = { #No
		name = "EVTOPTB7500"
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 7502 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7502" }
		}
	}
}
	
# Plotter informed Top Liege agrees
letter_event = {
	id = 7501
	desc = "EVTDESC7501"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7501"
		ROOT = { set_character_flag = weaken_vassal_plotter }
		plot_target_char = {
			letter_event = { id = 7504 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7504" }
		}
		FROM = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = approves_of_my_behaviour
				who = ROOT
				years = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = 7502
	desc = "EVTDESC7502"

	is_triggered_only = yes

		reveal_plot = yes
		FROM = {

				modifier = resentful_of_my_behaviour
				who = ROOT
				years = 2
			}
		}
	}

# Duke receives ultimatum from Top Liege
letter_event = {
	id = 7504
	desc = "EVTDESC7504"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #Take it!
		name = "EVTOPTA7504"
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				plot_target_title = {
					ROOT = {
						any_vassal = {
							tier = count
							any_demesne_title = {
								tier = count
								dejure_liege_title = {
									FROM = {
										plot_target_title = {
											title = PREVPREV
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			plot_target_title = {
				ROOT = {
					random_vassal = {
						limit = {
							tier = count
							any_demesne_title = {
								tier = count
								dejure_liege_title = {
									FROM = {
										plot_target_title = {
											title = PREVPREV
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						usurp_title = PREVPREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			liege = {
				letter_event = { 
					id = 7508
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Never
		name = "EVTOPTB7504"
		liege = {
			letter_event = { 
				id = 7509
				tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7509"
			}
		}
	}
}

# Duke receives ultimatum from Plotter
letter_event = {
	id = 7505
	desc = "EVTDESC7505"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #Take it!
		name = "EVTOPTA7505"
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				plot_target_title = {
					ROOT = {
						any_vassal = {
							tier = count
							any_demesne_title = {
								tier = count
								dejure_liege_title = {
									FROM = {
										plot_target_title = {
											title = PREVPREV
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			plot_target_title = {
				ROOT = {
					random_vassal = {
						limit = {
							tier = count
							any_demesne_title = {
								tier = count
								dejure_liege_title = {
									FROM = {
										plot_target_title = {
											title = PREVPREV
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						usurp_title = PREVPREV
						hidden_tooltip = {
							character_event = { id = 7515 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				letter_event = { id = 7506 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7505"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					plot_target_title = {
						ROOT = {
							any_vassal = {
								tier = count
								any_demesne_title = {
									tier = count
									dejure_liege_title = {
										FROM = {
											plot_target_title = {
												title = PREVPREV
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		# add effect...
		FROM = {
			plot_target_title = {
				usurp_title = FROM
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				character_event = { id = 7517 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #No!
		name = "EVTOPTB7505"
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 7507 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7507" }
		}
	}
}

# Plotter informed ultimatum rejected
letter_event = {
	id = 7507
	desc = "EVTDESC7507"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7507"
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		hidden_tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		plot_target_title = {
			reverse_war = {
				target = ROOT
				casus_belli = weaken_vassal_plot
				plot_backers = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7507"
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		prestige = -100
		any_plot_backer = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_coward
				who = ROOT
				years = 5
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				letter_event = { id = 8120 }
			}
		}
		cancel_plot = plot_weaken_fellow_vassal
	}
}

# Top Liege informed ultimatum accepted

	id = 7508
	desc = "EVTDESC7508"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7508"
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_vassal = {
				limit = { has_character_flag = weaken_vassal_plotter }
				character_event = { id = 7510 }
			}
			any_vassal = {
				limit = {
					any_vassal = {
						has_character_flag = weaken_vassal_plotter
					}
				}
				any_vassal = {
					limit = { has_character_flag = weaken_vassal_plotter }
					character_event = { id = 7510 }
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_bitter
				who = ROOT
				years = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
