### ARCHER AMBUSH - RULERS ONLY
# The plotter sees an opportunity - Archer Ambush
character_event = {
	id = 7700
	desc = "EVTDESC7700"
	picture = GFX_evt_longbowman
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_plot = plot_kill_character
			has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
		}
		plot_target_char = {
			age = 16
			is_ruler = yes
			at_location = ROOT # The Plot Head needs to be at the target's location to get a chance
			NOT = { trait = incapable }
			NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			prisoner = no
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
		plot_power_contribution = 
		{
			plotter = ROOT
			power = 0.025
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8400
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.10
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.20
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.30
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.40
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.50
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.60
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.70
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.80
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.90
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7700" # The conspirators provide the archers
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 1.0
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
					character_event = { id = 7712 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7705 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7705" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7700" # Hire archers
		trigger = {
			NOT = { plot_power = 0.5 }
			NOT = { martial = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7712 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7705 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7705" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7700" # Hire archers
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			NOT = { martial = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7712 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7705 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7705" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7700" # Knows good archers
		tooltip_info = martial
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			martial = 10
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7712 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7705 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7705" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { martial = 10 }
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
		}
	}
}

# A plot backer sees an opportunity - Archer Ambush
character_event = {
	id = 7701
	desc = "EVTDESC7701"
	picture = GFX_evt_longbowman
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		any_backed_character = {
			OR = {
				has_plot = plot_kill_character
				has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
			}
			plot_power = 0.5
			plot_target_char = {
				age = 16
				is_ruler = yes
				NOT = { trait = incapable }
				NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
				prisoner = no
			}
			NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
			ROOT = {
				plot_power_contribution = 
				{
					plotter = PREV
					power = 0.025
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8400
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.10
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.20
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.30
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.40
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.60
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.70
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.80
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.90
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7700" # The conspirators provide the archers
		trigger = {
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
			character_event = { id = 7710 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8151" # Ask the Plotter for funds
		trigger = {
			NOT = { martial = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7702 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8152" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7700" # Hire archers
		trigger = {
			NOT = { martial = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7710 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7700" # Knows good archers
		tooltip_info = martial
		trigger = {
			martial = 10
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
			character_event = { id = 7710 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { martial = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Archer Ambush - Plot backer requests funds
character_event = {
	id = 7702
	desc = "EVTDESC7702"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7702"
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1.0
		}
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7703 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8153" } }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8152"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7704 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8154" } }
	}
}

# Archer Ambush - plot backer receives funds
character_event = {
	id = 7703
	desc = "EVTDESC7703"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7705 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7705" } } }
	}
}

# Archer Ambush - plot backer does NOT receive funds
character_event = {
	id = 7704
	desc = "EVTDESC7704"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8154" # Pay for it myself
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7705 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7705" } } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8154" # Screw this
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
	}
}

# Archer Ambush - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 7705
	desc = "EVTDESC7705"
	picture = GFX_evt_longbowman
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	trigger = {
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7705" # Hit by arrows
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = paranoid
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = craven
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = trusting
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = craven }
						NOT = { trait = trusting }
						NOT = { trait = paranoid }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7713 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7713 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7706 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7714 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7714 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7707 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7705" # Avoids arrows
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = paranoid
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = craven
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = trusting
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = craven }
					NOT = { trait = trusting }
					NOT = { trait = paranoid }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7715 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7715 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7708 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7716 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7716 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7709 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Archer Ambush - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7706
	desc = "EVTDESC7706"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7706"
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
	
}

# Archer Ambush - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7707
	desc = "EVTDESC7706"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7707"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { character = FROM }
				}
				character_event = { id = 7712 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}

	id = 7713
	desc = "EVTDESC7713"
	picture = GFX_evt_longbowman

		clear_event_target = target_victim
	}

		name = "EVTOPTA8163"
	}
}

# Archer Ambush - Notification: Failure, and discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7715
	desc = "EVTDESC7715"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 11 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			reveal_plot = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7715"
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
			tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		}
	}
}

# Archer Ambush - Notification: Failure, but NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7716
	desc = "EVTDESC7716"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8166"
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
}

### MANURE EXPLOSION
# The plotter sees an opportunity - Manure Explosion
character_event = {
	id = 7720
	desc = "EVTDESC7720"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_plot = plot_kill_character
			has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
		}
		plot_target_char = {
			age = 16
			at_location = ROOT # The Plot Head needs to be at the target's location to get a chance
			NOT = { trait = incapable }
			NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			prisoner = no
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
		plot_power_contribution = 
		{
			plotter = ROOT
			power = 0.025
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8400
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.10
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.20
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.30
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.40
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.50
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.60
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.70
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.80
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.90
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7720" # The conspirators provide the manure
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 1.0
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
					character_event = { id = 7722 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7725 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7725" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7720" # Buy the manure
		trigger = {
			NOT = { plot_power = 0.5 }
			NOT = { stewardship = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7732 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7725 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7725" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7720" # Buy the manure
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			NOT = { stewardship = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7732 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7725 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7725" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7720" # Knows farmer
		tooltip_info = stewardship
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			stewardship = 10
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7732 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7725 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7725" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { stewardship = 10 }
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
		}
	}
}

# A plot backer sees an opportunity - Manure Explosion
character_event = {
	id = 7721
	desc = "EVTDESC7721"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		any_backed_character = {
			OR = {
				has_plot = plot_kill_character
				has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
			}
			plot_power = 0.5
			plot_target_char = {
				age = 16
				prisoner = no
				NOT = { trait = incapable }
				NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			}
			NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
			ROOT = {
				plot_power_contribution = 
				{
					plotter = PREV
					power = 0.025
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8400
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.10
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.20
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.30
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.40
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.60
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.70
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.80
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.90
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7720" # The conspirators provide the manure
		trigger = {
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
			character_event = { id = 7730 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8151" # Ask the Plotter for funds
		trigger = {
			NOT = { stewardship = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7722 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8152" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7720" # Buy the manure
		trigger = {
			NOT = { stewardship = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7730 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7720" # Knows farmer
		tooltip_info = stewardship
		trigger = {
			stewardship = 10
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
			character_event = { id = 7730 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { stewardship = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - Plot backer requests funds
character_event = {
	id = 7722
	desc = "EVTDESC7722"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7722"
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1.0
		}
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7723 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8153" } }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8152"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7724 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8154" } }
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - plot backer receives funds
character_event = {
	id = 7723
	desc = "EVTDESC7723"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7725 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7725" } } }
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - plot backer does NOT receive funds
character_event = {
	id = 7724
	desc = "EVTDESC7724"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8154" # Pay for it myself
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7725 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7725" } } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8154" # Screw this
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 7725
	desc = "EVTDESC7725"
	picture = GFX_evt_council
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	trigger = {
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7725" # Blown up
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = paranoid
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = diligent
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = trusting
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = diligent }
						NOT = { trait = trusting }
						NOT = { trait = paranoid }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7733 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7733 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7726 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7734 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7734 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7727 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7725" # Not blown up
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = paranoid
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = diligent
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = trusting
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = diligent }
					NOT = { trait = trusting }
					NOT = { trait = paranoid }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7735 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7735 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7728 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7736 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7736 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7729 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7726
	desc = "EVTDESC7726"
	picture = GFX_evt_burning_house
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7726"
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7727
	desc = "EVTDESC7726"
	picture = GFX_evt_burning_house
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7727"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - Backer informs Plotter of plan
character_event = {
	id = 7730
	desc = "EVTDESC7730"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7730"
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7731 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8161" } }
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { character = FROM }
				}
				character_event = { id = 7732 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - Notification: Success, but discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7733
	desc = "EVTDESC7733"
	picture = GFX_evt_burning_house
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 10 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8163"
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - Notification: Success, and NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7734
	desc = "EVTDESC7734"

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = "EVTOPTA7734"
	}

# Manure Explosion - Notification: Failure, and discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7735
	desc = "EVTDESC7735"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 11 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			reveal_plot = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7735"
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
			tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		}
	}
}

# Manure Explosion - Notification: Failure, but NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7736
	desc = "EVTDESC7736"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8166"
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
}

### INFANTICIDE - INFANTS ONLY
# The plotter sees an opportunity - Infanticide
character_event = {
	id = 7740
	desc = "EVTDESC7740"
	picture = GFX_evt_birth
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_plot = plot_kill_character
			has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
		}
		plot_target_char = {
			at_location = ROOT # The Plot Head needs to be at the target's location to get a chance
			NOT = { age = 5 }
			NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
		plot_power_contribution = 
		{
			plotter = ROOT
			power = 0.025
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1200
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.10
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.20
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.30
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.40
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.50
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.60
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.70
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.80
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.90
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7740" # The conspirators bribe the maid
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 1.0
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
					character_event = { id = 7742 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7745 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7745" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7740" # Bribe maid
		trigger = {
			NOT = { plot_power = 0.5 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7752 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7745 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7745" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7740" # Bribe maid
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7752 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7745 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7745" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7740" # Knows maid
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			intrigue = 10
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7752 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7745 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7745" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
		}
	}
}

# A plot backer sees an opportunity - Infanticide
character_event = {
	id = 7741
	desc = "EVTDESC7741"
	picture = GFX_evt_birth
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		any_backed_character = {
			OR = {
				has_plot = plot_kill_character
				has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
			}
			plot_power = 0.5
			plot_target_char = {
				NOT = { age = 5 }
				NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			}
			NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
			ROOT = {
				plot_power_contribution = 
				{
					plotter = PREV
					power = 0.025
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1200
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.10
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.20
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.30
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.40
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.60
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.70
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.80
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.90
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7740" # The conspirators bribe the maid
		trigger = {
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
			character_event = { id = 7750 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8151" # Ask the Plotter for funds
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7742 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8152" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7740" # Bribe maid
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7750 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7740" # Knows maid
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			intrigue = 10
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
			character_event = { id = 7750 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Infanticide - Plot backer requests funds
character_event = {
	id = 7742
	desc = "EVTDESC7742"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7742"
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1.0
		}
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7743 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8153" } }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8152"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7744 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8154" } }
	}
}

# Infanticide - plot backer receives funds
character_event = {
	id = 7743
	desc = "EVTDESC7743"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7745 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7745" } } }
	}
}

# Infanticide - plot backer does NOT receive funds
character_event = {
	id = 7744
	desc = "EVTDESC7744"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8154" # Pay for it myself
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7745 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7745" } } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8154" # Screw this
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
	}
}

# Infanticide - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 7745
	desc = "EVTDESC7745"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadow
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	trigger = {
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7745" # Smothered
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = brave
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = gregarious
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = trusting
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = brave }
						NOT = { trait = trusting }
						NOT = { trait = gregarious }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7753 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7753 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7746 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7754 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7754 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7747 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7745" # Not smothered
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = brave
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = gregarious
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = trusting
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = gregarious }
					NOT = { trait = trusting }
					NOT = { trait = brave }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7755 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7755 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7748 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7756 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7756 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7749 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Infanticide - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7746
	desc = "EVTDESC7746"
	picture = GFX_evt_family
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7746"
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
	
}

# Infanticide - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7747
	desc = "EVTDESC7746"
	picture = GFX_evt_family
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7747"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = 7750
	desc = "EVTDESC7750"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7750"
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7751 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8161" } }
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { character = FROM }
				}
				character_event = { id = 7752 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}

# Infanticide - Plotter tells backer to go ahead
character_event = {
	id = 7751
	desc = "EVTDESC7751"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8161"
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7745 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7745" } } }
	}
}

# Infanticide - Initiator informs other plotter
character_event = {
	id = 7752
	desc = "EVTDESC7752"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8162"
	}
}

# Infanticide - Notification: Success, but discovered

	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 10 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8163"
	}
}

# Infanticide - Notification: Failure, and discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7755
	desc = "EVTDESC7755"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 11 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			reveal_plot = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7755"
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
			tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		}
	}
}

# Infanticide - Notification: Failure, but NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7756
	desc = "EVTDESC7756"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8166"
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
}

### PRISON BREAK - PRISONERS ONLY
# The plotter sees an opportunity - Prison Break
character_event = {
	id = 7760
	desc = "EVTDESC7760"
	picture = GFX_evt_into_the_dungeon
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_plot = plot_kill_character
			has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
		}
		plot_target_char = {
			age = 5
			at_location = ROOT # The Plot Head needs to be at the target's location to get a chance
			prisoner = yes
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
		plot_power_contribution = 
		{
			plotter = ROOT
			power = 0.025
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1200
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.10
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.20
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.30
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.40
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.50
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.60
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.70
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.80
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.90
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7760" # The conspirators get the man inside
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 1.0
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
					character_event = { id = 7762 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7765 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7765" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7760" # Hire killer
		trigger = {
			NOT = { plot_power = 0.5 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7772 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7765 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7765" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7760" # Hire killer
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7772 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7765 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7765" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7760" # Knows the man for the job
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			intrigue = 10
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7772 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7765 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7765" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
		}
	}
}

# A plot backer sees an opportunity - Prison Break
character_event = {
	id = 7761
	desc = "EVTDESC7761"
	picture = GFX_evt_into_the_dungeon
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		any_backed_character = {
			OR = {
				has_plot = plot_kill_character
				has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
			}
			plot_power = 0.5
			plot_target_char = {
				age = 5
				prisoner = yes
			}
			NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
			ROOT = {
				plot_power_contribution = 
				{
					plotter = PREV
					power = 0.025
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1200
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.10
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.20
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.30
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.40
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.60
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.70
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.80
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.90
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7760" # The conspirators get the man inside
		trigger = {
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
			character_event = { id = 7770 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8151" # Ask the Plotter for funds
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7762 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8152" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7760" # Hire killer
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7770 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7760" # Knows the man for the job
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			intrigue = 10
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
			character_event = { id = 7770 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Prison Break - Plot backer requests funds
character_event = {
	id = 7762
	desc = "EVTDESC7762"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7762"
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1.0
		}
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7763 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8153" } }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8152"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7764 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8154" } }
	}
}

# Prison Break - plot backer receives funds
character_event = {
	id = 7763
	desc = "EVTDESC7763"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7765 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7765" } } }
	}
}

# Prison Break - plot backer does NOT receive funds
character_event = {
	id = 7764
	desc = "EVTDESC7764"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8154" # Pay for it myself
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7765 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7765" } } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8154" # Screw this
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
	}
}

# Prison Break - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 7765
	desc = "EVTDESC7765"
	picture = GFX_evt_into_the_dungeon
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	trigger = {
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7765" # Tries to escape
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = paranoid
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = craven
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = trusting
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = craven }
						NOT = { trait = trusting }
						NOT = { trait = paranoid }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7773 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7773 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7766 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7774 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7774 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7767 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7765" # Does not try to escape
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = paranoid
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = craven
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = trusting
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = craven }
					NOT = { trait = trusting }
					NOT = { trait = paranoid }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7775 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7775 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7768 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7776 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7776 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7769 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Prison Break - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7766
	desc = "EVTDESC7766"
	picture = GFX_evt_into_the_dungeon
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7766"
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
	
}

# Prison Break - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7767
	desc = "EVTDESC7766"
	picture = GFX_evt_into_the_dungeon
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7767"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

# Prison Break - Lives, murderer discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7768
	desc = "EVTDESC7768"
	picture = GFX_evt_into_the_dungeon
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7768"
	}
}

# Prison Break - Backer informs Plotter of plan

	id = 7770
	desc = "EVTDESC7770"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7770"
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7771 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8161" } }
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { character = FROM }
				}
				character_event = { id = 7772 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
