# Hunting Accident - plot backer does NOT receive funds
character_event = {
	id = 7864
	desc = "EVTDESC7864"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8154" # Pay for it myself
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7865 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7865" } } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8154" # Screw this
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
	}
}

# Hunting Accident - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 7865
	desc = "EVTDESC7865"
	picture = GFX_evt_hunt
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	trigger = {
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7865" # Drowns
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = paranoid
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = gregarious
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = trusting
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = paranoid }
						NOT = { trait = gregarious }
						NOT = { trait = trusting }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7873 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7873 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7866 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7874 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7874 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7867 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7865" # Does not drown
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = paranoid
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = gregarious
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = trusting
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = paranoid }
					NOT = { trait = gregarious }
					NOT = { trait = trusting }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7875 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7875 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7868 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7876 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7876 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7869 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Hunting Accident - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7866
	desc = "EVTDESC7866"
	picture = GFX_evt_hunt
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7866"
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
	
}

# Hunting Accident - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7867
	desc = "EVTDESC7866"
	picture = GFX_evt_hunt
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7867"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

# Hunting Accident - Notification: Failure, and discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7875
	desc = "EVTDESC7875"
	picture = GFX_evt_hunt
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 11 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			reveal_plot = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7875"
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
			tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		}
	}
}

### DISGUISED HIGHWAYMEN
# The plotter sees an opportunity - Disguised Highwaymen
character_event = {
	id = 7880
	desc = "EVTDESC7880"
	picture = GFX_evt_bandits
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_plot = plot_kill_character
			has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
		}
		plot_target_char = {
			age = 16
			NOT = { trait = incapable }
			prisoner = no
			at_location = ROOT # The Plot Head needs to be at the target's location to get a chance
			NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
		plot_power_contribution = 
		{
			plotter = ROOT
			power = 0.025
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8400
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.10
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.20
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.30
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.40
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.50
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.60
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.70
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.80
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.90
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7880" # The conspirators bribe the servants
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 1.0
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
					character_event = { id = 7882 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7885 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7885" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7880" # Bribe servants
		trigger = {
			NOT = { plot_power = 0.5 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7892 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7885 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7885" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7880" # Bribe servants
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7892 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7885 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7885" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7880" # Replace with own servants
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			intrigue = 10
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7892 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7885 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7885" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
		}
	}
}

# A plot backer sees an opportunity - Disguised Highwaymen
character_event = {
	id = 7881
	desc = "EVTDESC7881"
	picture = GFX_evt_bandits
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		any_backed_character = {
			OR = {
				has_plot = plot_kill_character
				has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
			}
			plot_power = 0.5
			plot_target_char = {
				age = 16
				NOT = { trait = incapable }
				prisoner = no
				NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			}
			NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
			ROOT = {
				plot_power_contribution = 
				{
					plotter = PREV
					power = 0.025
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8400
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.10
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.20
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.30
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.40
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.60
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.70
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.80
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.90
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7880" # The conspirators bribe servants
		trigger = {
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
			character_event = { id = 7890 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8151" # Ask the Plotter for funds
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7882 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8152" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7880" # Bribe servants
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7890 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7880" # Replace with own servants
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			intrigue = 10
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
			character_event = { id = 7890 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Disguised Highwaymen - Plot backer requests funds
character_event = {
	id = 7882
	desc = "EVTDESC7882"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7882"
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1.0
		}
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7883 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8153" } }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8152"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7884 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8154" } }
	}
}

# Disguised Highwaymen - plot backer receives funds
character_event = {
	id = 7883
	desc = "EVTDESC7883"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7885 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7885" } } }
	}
}

# Disguised Highwaymen - plot backer does NOT receive funds
character_event = {
	id = 7884
	desc = "EVTDESC7884"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8154" # Pay for it myself
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7885 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7885" } } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8154" # Screw this
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
	}
}

# Disguised Highwaymen - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 7885
	desc = "EVTDESC7885"
	picture = GFX_evt_bandits
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	trigger = {
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7885" # Drowns
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = paranoid
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = diligent
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = trusting
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = paranoid }
						NOT = { trait = diligent }
						NOT = { trait = trusting }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7893 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7893 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7886 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7894 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7894 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7887 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7885" # Does not drown
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = paranoid
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = diligent
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = trusting
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = diligent }
					NOT = { trait = paranoid }
					NOT = { trait = trusting }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7895 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7895 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7888 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7896 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7896 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7889 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Disguised Highwaymen - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7886
	desc = "EVTDESC7886"
	picture = GFX_evt_bandits
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7886"
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
	
}

# Disguised Highwaymen - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7887
	desc = "EVTDESC7886"
	picture = GFX_evt_bandits
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7887"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

# Disguised Highwaymen - Notification: Failure, and discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7895
	desc = "EVTDESC7895"
	picture = GFX_evt_bandits
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 11 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			reveal_plot = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7895"
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
			tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		}
	}
}

# Disguised Highwaymen - Notification: Failure, but NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7896
	desc = "EVTDESC7896"
	picture = GFX_evt_bandits
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8166"

					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse

			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}

### CARRIAGE ACCIDENT
# The plotter sees an opportunity - Carriage Accident
character_event = {
	id = 7900
	desc = "EVTDESC7900"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_plot = plot_kill_character
			has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
		}
		plot_target_char = {
			age = 16
			NOT = { trait = incapable }
			prisoner = no
			at_location = ROOT # The Plot Head needs to be at the target's location to get a chance
			NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
		plot_power_contribution = 
		{
			plotter = ROOT
			power = 0.025
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8400
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.10
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.20
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.30
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.40
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.50
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.60
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.70
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.80
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.90
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7900" # The conspirators bribe the servants
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 1.0
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
					character_event = { id = 7902 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7905 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7905" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7900" # Bribe servants
		trigger = {
			NOT = { plot_power = 0.5 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7912 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7905 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7905" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7900" # Bribe servants
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7912 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7905 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7905" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7900" # Replace with own servants
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			intrigue = 10
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7912 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7905 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7905" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
		}
	}
}

# A plot backer sees an opportunity - Carriage Accident
character_event = {
	id = 7901
	desc = "EVTDESC7901"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		any_backed_character = {
			OR = {
				has_plot = plot_kill_character
				has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
			}
			plot_power = 0.5
			plot_target_char = {
				age = 16
				NOT = { trait = incapable }
				prisoner = no
				NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			}
			NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
			ROOT = {
				plot_power_contribution = 
				{
					plotter = PREV
					power = 0.025
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8400
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.10
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.20
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.30
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.40
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.50
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.60
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.70
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.80
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.90
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7900" # The conspirators bribe servants
		trigger = {
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
			character_event = { id = 7910 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8151" # Ask the Plotter for funds
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7902 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8152" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7900" # Bribe servants
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7910 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7900" # Replace with own servants
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			intrigue = 10
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
			character_event = { id = 7900 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Carriage Accident - Plot backer requests funds
character_event = {
	id = 7902
	desc = "EVTDESC7902"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7902"
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1.0
		}
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7903 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8153" } }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8152"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7904 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8154" } }
	}
}

# Carriage Accident - plot backer receives funds
character_event = {
	id = 7903
	desc = "EVTDESC7903"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EXCELLENT"
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7905 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7905" } } }
	}
}

# Carriage Accident - plot backer does NOT receive funds
character_event = {
	id = 7904
	desc = "EVTDESC7904"
	picture = GFX_evt_spymaster
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8154" # Pay for it myself
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		FROM = { plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7905 days = 27 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7905" } } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8154" # Screw this
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
	}
}

# Carriage Accident - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 7905
	desc = "EVTDESC7905"
	picture = GFX_evt_carriage
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	trigger = {
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7905" # Drowns
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = paranoid
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = diligent
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = trusting
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = diligent }
						NOT = { trait = paranoid }
						NOT = { trait = trusting }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7913 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7913 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7906 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7914 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7914 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7907 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7905" # Does not drown
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = paranoid
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = diligent
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = trusting
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = diligent }
					NOT = { trait = paranoid }
					NOT = { trait = trusting }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7915 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7915 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7908 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7916 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7916 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7909 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Carriage Accident - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7906
	desc = "EVTDESC7906"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7906"
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
	
}

# Carriage Accident - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7907
	desc = "EVTDESC7906"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7907"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

			any_plot_backer = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { character = FROM }

		}
	}

# Carriage Accident - Notification: Failure, and discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7915
	desc = "EVTDESC7915"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 11 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			reveal_plot = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7915"
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
			tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		}
	}
}

# Carriage Accident - Notification: Failure, but NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7916
	desc = "EVTDESC7916"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = "EVTOPTA8166"

					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse

		}
	}

### DECADENT DEBAUCHERY
# The plotter sees an opportunity - Decadent Debauchery
character_event = {
	id = 7950
	desc = "EVTDESC7950"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_plot = plot_kill_character
			has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
		}
		plot_target_char = {
			age = 16
			NOT = { trait = incapable }
			prisoner = no
			at_location = ROOT # The Plot Head needs to be at the target's location to get a chance
			NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
			trait = decadent
			dynasty = ROOT
		}
		NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
		plot_power_contribution = 
		{
			plotter = ROOT
			power = 0.025
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 7300
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.10
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.20
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.30
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.40
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.50
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.60
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.70
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.80
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 0.90
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			plot_power_contribution = 
			{
				plotter = ROOT
				power = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7950" # The conspirators bribe the servants
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 1.0
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
					character_event = { id = 7952 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7955 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7955" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7950" # Bribe servants
		trigger = {
			NOT = { plot_power = 0.5 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -1.0
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7962 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7955 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7955" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7950" # Bribe servants
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7962 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7955 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7955" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7950" # Replace with own servants
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			plot_power = 0.5
			intrigue = 10
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_plot_backer = {
				character_event = { id = 7962 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		
		set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		plot_target_char = { character_event = { id = 7955 days = 30 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP7955" } }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
		}
	}
}

# A plot backer sees an opportunity - Decadent Debauchery
character_event = {
	id = 7951
	desc = "EVTDESC7951"
	picture = GFX_evt_whispers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	is_part_of_plot = yes
	
	trigger = {
		any_backed_character = {
			OR = {
				has_plot = plot_kill_character
				has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
			}
			plot_power = 0.5
			plot_target_char = {
				age = 16
				NOT = { trait = incapable }
				prisoner = no
				NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
				trait = decadent
				dynasty = PREV
			}
			NOT = { has_character_flag = murder_in_motion }
			ROOT = {
				plot_power_contribution = 
				{
					plotter = PREV
					power = 0.025
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 7300
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				ROOT = {
					plot_power_contribution = 
					{
						plotter = PREV
						power = 0.10
					}
				}
			}
		}

					plot_power_contribution =

				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 2.0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7950" # The conspirators bribe servants
		trigger = {
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 1.0
			}
			character_event = { id = 7960 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8151" # Ask the Plotter for funds
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7952 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8152" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7950" # Bribe servants
		trigger = {
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
		scaled_wealth = -0.5
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				NOT = { plot_power = 1.0 }
			}
			character_event = { id = 7960 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC7950" # Replace with own servants
		tooltip_info = intrigue
		trigger = {
			intrigue = 10
			any_backed_character = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		random_backed_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_power = 0.5
			}
			character_event = { id = 7950 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8160" }
			set_character_flag = murder_in_motion
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTD8150" # I cannot afford this
		trigger = {
			ai = no
			NOT = { intrigue = 10 }
			NOT = {
				any_backed_character = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_power = 1.0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8152"
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1.0
		}
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7953 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8153" } }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8152"
		FROM = { character_event = { id = 7954 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8154" } }
	}
}

# Decadent Debauchery - the murder attempt
character_event = {
	id = 7955
	desc = "EVTDESC7955"
	picture = GFX_evt_jugglers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target_victim
	}
	
	trigger = {
		# Is the plot still in motion?
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			FROMFROM = {
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
				plot_target_char = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7955" # Dies
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = slothful
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = proud
					random = 33
				}
				AND = {
					trait = hedonist
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = gluttonous
					random = 50
				}
				AND = {
					trait = drunkard
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					trait = lustful
					random = 90
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { trait = drunkard }
					NOT = { trait = hedonist }
					NOT = { trait = lustful }
					NOT = { trait = gluttonous }
					NOT = { trait = slothful }
					NOT = { trait = proud }
					random = 75
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				25 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7963 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7963 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7956 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer discovered
				}
				75 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7964 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7964 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7957 days = 1 } # Dies, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB7955" # Does not die
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						trait = slothful
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = proud
						random = 33
					}
					AND = {
						trait = hedonist
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = gluttonous
						random = 50
					}
					AND = {
						trait = drunkard
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						trait = lustful
						random = 90
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { trait = drunkard }
						NOT = { trait = hedonist }
						NOT = { trait = lustful }
						NOT = { trait = gluttonous }
						NOT = { trait = slothful }
						NOT = { trait = proud }
						random = 75
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7965 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7965 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7958 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer discovered
				}
				50 = {
					hidden_tooltip = {
						FROM = { character_event = { id = 7966 days = 1 } }
						FROMFROM = { character_event = { id = 7966 days = 1 } }
					}
					character_event = { id = 7959 days = 1 } # Lives, murderer unknown
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Decadent Debauchery - Dies, murderer(s) discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7956
	desc = "EVTDESC7956"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7956"
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
	
}

# Decadent Debauchery - Dies, murderer NOT discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7957
	desc = "EVTDESC7956"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	hide_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7957"
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_plot = plot_kill_character
						has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
					}
					plot_target_char = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROMFROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			death = {
				death_reason = death_murder_unknown
				killer = FROMFROM
			}
		}
	}
}

# Decadent Debauchery - Notification: Failure, and discovered
character_event = {
	id = 7965
	desc = "EVTDESC7965"
	picture = GFX_evt_shadowy_cabal
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		character_event = { id = 11 } # Consequences of discovery
		clear_event_target = target_victim
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			reveal_plot = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA7965"
		if = {
			limit = { 
				plot_target_char = {
					character = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					has_plot = plot_kill_character
					has_plot = plot_kill_spouse
				}
			}
			clr_character_flag = murder_in_motion
			tooltip = { reveal_plot = yes }
		}
	}
}

# Ultimatum - antiking
letter_event = {
	id = 8200
	desc = EVTDESC8200
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		FROM = { in_faction = faction_antiking }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			diplomatic_immunity = yes 
			any_faction_backer = {
				faction = faction_antiking
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA8000
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					FROM = {
						faction_power = 
						{
							faction = faction_antiking
							power = 1.0
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = weak
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = craven
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = charitable
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = content
			}
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_vassal = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOT = { in_faction = faction_antiking }
				}
				character_event = { id = 8202 }
			}
			FROM = {
				letter_event = { id = 8203 }
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_antiking
					letter_event = { id = 8201 }
					diplomatic_immunity = no
				}
				diplomatic_immunity = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			religion_authority = {
				modifier = deposed_antipope
				years = 50
			}
			faction_antiking = { # The target (title) of the faction
				if = {
					limit = { has_law = investiture_law_1 }
					add_law_w_cooldown = investiture_law_0
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						religion = twelve
					}
					k_papal_state = {
						holder_scope = {
							opinion = {
								who = PREVPREV
								modifier = opinion_deposed_antipope
							}
						}
					}
				}
				#if = {
					#limit = {
						#religion = fraticelli
					#}
					#d_fraticelli = {
						#holder_scope = {
							#opinion = {
								#who = PREVPREV
								#modifier = opinion_deposed_antipope
							#}
						#}
					#}
				#}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			rightful_religious_head_scope = {
				remove_claim = k_papal_state
				remove_claim = d_fraticelli
			}
		}
		
		primary_title = {
			usurp_title = FROM
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8000"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = strong
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = brave
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_antiking
						power = 1.5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_antiking
						power = 1.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_antiking
						power = 2.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_antiking
						power = 3.0
					}
				}
			}	
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_antiking
						power = 4.0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { faction_power = { faction = faction_antiking power = 1.0 } }
				}
				random = {
					chance = 25
					character_event = { id = 45002 days = 120 } # Loyalists flock to the liege's banner
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 8204 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8100" }
			tooltip = {
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_antiking
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_antiking power = 0.75 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = {
						}
						30 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						faction_power = { faction = faction_antiking power = 0.75 }
						NOT = { faction_power = { faction = faction_antiking power = 1.5 } }
					}
					random_list = {
						75 = {
						}
						5 = {
							character_event = { id = 45000 days = 17 } # A great number of rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
						20 = {
							character_event = { id = 45004 days = 17 } # Rebels flock to the revolter's banner
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform faction backer - antiking

	id = 8201
	desc = EVTDESC8201
	
	show_from_from = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "GOOD"
		reverse_opinion = {
			modifier = opinion_grateful
			who = FROMFROM
			years = 5
		}
		
		add_character_modifier = {
			name = faction_antiking_ultimatum_timer
			hidden = yes
			duration = 3650
		}
	}
}

	id = 8204

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = EVTOPTA8100
		
		clr_character_flag = faction_install_antiking_ultimatum_taken
		
		faction_antiking = { # The target (title) of the faction
			reverse_war = {
				target = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_install_antiking
				faction = faction_antiking
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ultimatum - overthrow
letter_event = {
	id = 8210
	desc = EVTDESC8210
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		FROM = { in_faction = faction_overthrow }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			diplomatic_immunity = yes 
			any_faction_backer = {
				faction = faction_overthrow
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA8000
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					FROM = {
						faction_power = 
						{
							faction = faction_overthrow
							power = 1.0
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = weak
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = craven
			}
		}
		
		custom_tooltip = { text = khagan_overthrow_execution_warning_tooltip }
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_vassal = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					NOT = { in_faction = faction_overthrow }
				}
				character_event = { id = 8212 }
			}
			FROM = {
				letter_event = { id = 8213 }
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_overthrow
					letter_event = { id = 8211 }
					diplomatic_immunity = no
				}
				diplomatic_immunity = no
			}
		}
		
		primary_title = {
			gain_title = { target = FROM type = faction_demand }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8000"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = strong
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = brave
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_overthrow
						power = 1.5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_overthrow
						power = 1.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_overthrow
						power = 2.0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_overthrow
						power = 3.0
					}
				}
			}	
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = {
					faction_power = 
					{
						faction = faction_overthrow
						power = 4.0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = 8214 days = 3 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP8100" }
			tooltip = {
				any_faction_backer = {
					faction = faction_overthrow
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

######################################
#
# Polygamy Events

# Event ID 89000 - 89249 reserved

### Wives fall in love with each other
character_event = {
	id = 89000
	desc = "EVTDESC89000"
	picture = GFX_evt_lovers
	
	trigger = {
		religion_group = rastullah_group
		is_female = yes
		is_married = yes
		trait = homosexual
		spouse = {
			any_spouse = {
				NOT = { character = ROOT }
				trait = homosexual
				is_alive = yes
				at_location = ROOT
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_character_flag = thelma
			has_character_flag = louise
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
	}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA89000"
		set_character_flag = thelma
		spouse = {
			any_spouse = {
				limit = {
					trait = homosexual
					NOT = { character = ROOT }
				}
				set_character_flag = louise
				add_lover = ROOT
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				character_event = { id = 89001 days = 14 }
			}
		}
	}
}
					
# Husband finds out
character_event = {
	id = 89001
	desc = "EVTDESC89001"
	picture = GFX_evt_lovers
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Accept it.
		name = "EVTOPTA89001"
		decadence = 2
		any_spouse = {
			limit = { has_character_flag = thelma }
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_grateful
				who = ROOT
				months = 12
			}
		}
		any_spouse = {
			limit = { has_character_flag = louise }
			opinion = {
				modifier = opinion_grateful
				who = ROOT
				months = 12
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Order them to stop.
		name = "EVTOPTB89001"
		hidden_tooltip = {
			character_event = { id = 89002 days = 30 }
		}
		piety = 20
	}
	option = { # Execute them
		name = "EVTOPTC89001"
		any_spouse = {
			limit = { has_character_flag = thelma }
			death = { death_reason = death_execution killer = ROOT }
		}
		any_spouse = {
			limit = { has_character_flag = louise }
			death = { death_reason = death_execution killer = ROOT }
		}
	}
}

# Husband finds out they've fled!
character_event = {
	id = 89002
	desc = "EVTDESC89002"
	picture = GFX_evt_bad_news
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA89002"
		character_event = { id = 89003 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89003" }
	}
}

# The wives drive their carriage over a cliff
character_event = {
	id = 89003
	desc = "EVTDESC89003"
	picture = GFX_evt_moors
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA89003"
		any_spouse = {
			limit = { has_character_flag = thelma }
			death = { death_reason = death_suicide }
		}
		any_spouse = {
			limit = { has_character_flag = louise }
			death = { death_reason = death_suicide }
		}
	}
}

### Secondary Wife schemes to become First Wife

# Secondary Wife thinks she should be First Wife
character_event = {
	id = 89005
	desc = "EVTDESC89005"
	picture = GFX_evt_quarrel
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	
	trigger = {
		is_female = yes
		age = 16
		is_married = yes
		is_pregnant = no
		NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
		is_main_spouse = no
		religion_group = rastullah_group
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
	months = 420
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			trait = envious
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			trait = ambitious
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			trait = deceitful
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 2.0
			trait = kind
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 2.0
			trait = shy
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 4.0
			trait = content
		}
	}
	
	option = { # Kill First Wife!
		name = "EVTOPTA89005"
		#tooltip_info = 
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				trait = cruel
				trait = deceitful
				trait = lunatic
			}
		}
		set_character_flag = plotting_second_wife
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				spouse = {
					random_spouse = {
						limit = { is_main_spouse = yes }
						death = {
							death_reason = death_murder
							killer = ROOT
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = 89006 days = 4 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89007" }
				}
			}
			50 = {
				spouse = {
					random_spouse = {
						limit = { is_main_spouse = yes }
						character_event = { id = 89007 days = 4 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89007" }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Woo husband
		name = "EVTOPTB89005"
		set_character_flag = plotting_second_wife
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		spouse = {
			character_event = { id = 89010 days = 4 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89010" }
		}
	}
	option = { # Do nothing
		name = "EVTOPTC89005"
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		random_list = {
			50 = { 
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = content
							trait = ambitious
						}
					}
					add_trait = content
					piety = 20
				}
			}
			50 = {
				piety = 20
			}
		}
	}
}

# First Wife is murdered by Second Wife
character_event = {
	id = 89006
	desc = "EVTDESC89006"
	picture = GFX_evt_death
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Accept it
		name = "EVTOPTA89006"
	}
	option = { # Send killer to prison
		name = "EVTOPTB89006"
		random_spouse = {
			limit = { has_character_flag = plotting_second_wife }
			imprison = yes
			clr_character_flag = plotting_second_wife
		}
	}
	option = { # Have killer executed
		name = "EVTOPTC89006"
		random_spouse = {
			limit = { has_character_flag = plotting_second_wife }
			death = {
				death_reason = death_execution
				killer = ROOT
			}
			clr_character_flag = plotting_second_wife
		}
	}
}

### First Wife thinks her son should get a county if he is not heir
character_event = {
	id = 89015
	desc = "EVTDESC89015"
	picture = GFX_evt_quarrel
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	religion_group = rastullah_group
	
	trigger = {
		is_female = yes
		num_of_children = 1
		age = 16
		is_married = yes
		is_pregnant = no
		is_main_spouse = yes
		spouse = { demesne_size = 5 }
		spouse = { religion_group = rastullah_group }
		NOT = { has_character_flag = envious_mother }
		any_child = {
			is_female = no
			is_primary_heir = no
			is_alive = yes
			age = 14
		}
		NOT = { any_child = { is_primary_heir = yes } }
		NOT = { any_child = { has_character_flag = first_wife_son } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 320
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			trait = envious
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			trait = ambitious
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 2.0
			trait = slothful
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 4.0
			trait = content
		}
	}
		
	
	option = { # Speak to husband
		name = "EVTOPTA89015"
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		set_character_flag = envious_mother
		any_child = {
			limit = { 
				is_female = no
				age = 14
				is_primary_heir = no
			}
			set_character_flag = first_wife_son
			character_event = { id = 89016 days = 2 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89016" }
		}
	}
	option = { # Do nothing
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "EVTOPTB89015"
	}
}

# Son informed
character_event = {
	id = 89016
	desc = "EVTDESC89016"
	picture = GFX_evt_quarrel
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA89016"
		father = { character_event = { id = 89017 days = 2 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89017" } }
	}
}

# Husband informed
character_event = {
	id = 89017
	desc = "EVTDESC89017"
	picture = GFX_evt_quarrel
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Grant county
		name = "EVTOPTA89017"
		random_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {	tier = duke }
				NOT = {	tier = king }
				NOT = {	tier = emperor }
				NOT = {	location = { is_capital = yes }	}
			}
			ROOT = {
				any_child = {
					limit = { has_character_flag = first_wife_son }
					grant_title = PREVPREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Say no
		name = "EVTOPTB89017"
		FROM = {
			mother = {
				opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = opinion_very_disappointed
					years = 2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_child = {
				limit = { has_character_flag = first_wife_son }
				character_event = { id = 89018 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Son informed he is not getting county
character_event = {
	id = 89018
	desc = "EVTDESC89018"
	picture = GFX_evt_quarrel
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA89018"
		FROM = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_disappointed
				years = 2
			}
		}
	}
}
		

### Secondary Wife plots to kill heir
character_event = {
	id = 89020
	desc = "EVTDESC89020"
	picture = GFX_evt_quarrel
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	religion_group = rastullah_group

	trigger = {
		is_female = yes
		num_of_children = 1
		age = 16
		is_married = yes
		is_pregnant = no
		NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
		spouse = {
			is_ruler = yes
			any_child = { 
				is_primary_heir = yes
				ai = yes
				is_alive = yes
				NOT = { age = 16 }
				mother = { NOT = { character = ROOT } }
				at_location = ROOT
			}
		}
		any_child = {
			is_female = no
			is_alive = yes
			is_primary_heir = no
			is_pretender = yes
		}
		NOT = {
			any_child = { is_primary_heir = yes	}
			has_character_flag = murdering_wife
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 420
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			trait = envious
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			trait = ambitious
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 2.0
			trait = slothful
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 4.0
			trait = content
		}
	}
	
	option = { # Murder heir
		name = "EVTOPTA89020"
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		set_character_flag = murdering_wife
		random_list = {
			35 = {
				spouse = {
					any_child = {
						limit = { is_primary_heir = yes }
						character_event = { id = 89023 days = 4 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89023" }
					}
					hidden_tooltip = {
						random_list = {
							50 = {
								character_event = { id = 89024 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89024" }
								any_child = {
									limit = { is_primary_heir = yes }
									death = { death_reason = death_murder_unknown }
								}
							}
							50 = {
								character_event = { id = 89025 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89025" }
								any_child = {
									limit = { is_primary_heir = yes }
									death = { death_reason = death_murder killer = ROOT }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			65 = {
				spouse = {
					any_child = {
						limit = { is_primary_heir = yes }
						character_event = { id = 89021 days = 4 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89021" }
					}
					hidden_tooltip = {
						character_event = { id = 89022 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89022" }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Do nothing
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "EVTOPTB89020"
	}
}

# Heir is informed of failed attempt

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = "EVTOPTA89021"
	}

	desc = "EVTDESC89022"
	picture = GFX_evt_quarrel
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Kill wife
		name = "EVTOPTA89022"
		FROM = { death = { death_reason = death_execution killer = ROOT } }
	}
	option = { # Imprison wife
		name = "EVTOPTB89022"
		FROM = { imprison = yes }
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_child = {
				limit = { is_primary_heir = yes }
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					modifier = attempted_murder
					years = 30
				}
				mother = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						modifier = attempted_murder
						years = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Do nothing
		name = "EVTOPTC89022"
		any_child = {
			limit = { is_primary_heir = yes }
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_very_disappointed
				years = 2
			}
			mother = {
				opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = opinion_very_disappointed
					years = 2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_child = {
				limit = { is_primary_heir = yes }
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					modifier = attempted_murder
					years = 30
				}
				mother = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						modifier = attempted_murder
						years = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = 89025
	desc = "EVTDESC89025"
	picture = GFX_evt_quarrel
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Kill wife
		name = "EVTOPTA89025"
		FROM = { death = { death_reason = death_execution killer = ROOT } }
	}
	option = { # Imprison wife
		name = "EVTOPTB89025"
		FROM = { imprison = yes }
		hidden_tooltip = {
			any_spouse = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { character = FROM }
				}
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					modifier = evil_murderer
					years = 40
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Do nothing
		name = "EVTOPTC89025"
		any_spouse = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { character = FROM }
			}
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_very_disappointed
				years = 8
			}
			opinion = {
				who = FROM
				modifier = evil_murderer
				years = 40
			}
		}
	}
}

### Evil wife plots to kill sons that aren't hers
character_event = {
	id = 89030
	desc = "EVTDESC89030"
	picture = GFX_evt_quarrel
	
	capable_only = yes
	prisoner = no
	religion_group = rastullah_group
	
	trigger = {
		is_female = yes
		num_of_children = 1
		age = 16
		is_married = yes
		is_pregnant = no
		NOT = { trait = in_hiding }
		any_child = {
			is_female = no
			is_alive = yes
		}
		spouse = {
			any_child = {
				ai = yes
				is_alive = yes
				is_female = no
				NOT = { age = 16 }
				mother = { NOT = { character = ROOT } }
				is_primary_heir = no
				at_location = ROOT
			}
		}
		NOT = { trait = kind }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 820
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			trait = envious
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			trait = cruel
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			trait = ambitious
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			trait = greedy
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 5.0
			trait = honest
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 5.0
			trait = just
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 5.0
			trait = content
		}
	}
	
	option = { # Murder son
		name = "EVTOPTA89020"
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				spouse = {
					random_child = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { age = 16 }
							is_female = no
							mother = { NOT = { character = ROOT } }
							is_primary_heir = no
							is_alive = yes
						}
						set_character_flag = victim_son
						character_event = { id = 89033 days = 4 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89023" }
					}
					hidden_tooltip = {
						random_list = {
							50 = {
								character_event = { id = 89034 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89024" }
								any_child = {
									limit = { has_character_flag = victim_son }
									death = { death_reason = death_murder_unknown }
								}
							}
							50 = {
								character_event = { id = 89035 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89025" }
								any_child = {
									limit = { has_character_flag = victim_son }
									death = { death_reason = death_murder killer = ROOT }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			50 = {
				spouse = {
					random_child = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { age = 16 }
							is_female = no
							mother = { NOT = { character = ROOT } }
							is_primary_heir = no
							is_alive = yes
						}
						character_event = { id = 89031 days = 4 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89021" }
					}
					hidden_tooltip = {
						character_event = { id = 89032 tooltip = "EVTTOOLTIP89022" }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Do nothing
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "EVTOPTB89020"
	}
}

		clr_character_flag = victim_son

################################################
#
# Events for Pope vs Free Investiture
#
# ID 67000 - 67999 are reserved
#
##################################################
# Written by Johan Andersson


# The Pope singles out a Kingdom with Free Investiture (unless he has already targetted one)
character_event = {
	id = 67000
	desc = EVTDESC67000
	picture = GFX_evt_icon
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	only_playable = yes
	religion_group = twelve
	min_age = 16
	#only_men = yes
	prisoner = no
	only_capable = yes
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1000
		OR = {
			religion = twelve
			#religion = fraticelli
		}
		controls_religion = yes
		war = no
		religion_authority = 0.35
		NOT = {	has_character_flag = pope_currently_demanding	}
		any_independent_ruler = {
			religion = ROOT
			rightful_religious_head = ROOT
			NOT = {	has_character_flag = pope_wants_our_law_changed }
			NOT = {	has_character_flag = pope_respects_our_law }
			primary_title = {
				OR = {
					tier = KING
					tier = EMPEROR
				}
				has_law = investiture_law_1 
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 50
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			trait = zealous
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA67000
		ai_chance = {	factor = 100 }
		random_independent_ruler = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				rightful_religious_head = ROOT
				NOT = {	has_character_flag = pope_wants_our_law_changed }
				NOT = {	has_character_flag = pope_respects_our_law }
				primary_title = {
					OR = {
						tier = KING
						tier = EMPEROR
					}
					has_law = investiture_law_1 
				}
			}
			character_event = { id = 67001 days = 14 tooltip = EVTTOOLTIP67001 }
			set_character_flag = pope_wants_our_law_changed
		}
		set_character_flag = pope_currently_demanding
	}

	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB67000
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}


# King/Emperor gets the papal emissary asking them to change laws!
character_event = {
	id = 67001
	desc = EVTDESC67001
	picture = GFX_evt_pope
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA67001 # Fold to demand
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
		
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = pope_currently_demanding }
		
		primary_title = {
			revoke_law = investiture_law_1
			add_law_w_cooldown = investiture_law_0
		}
		piety = 25
		religion_authority = {
			modifier = ruler_bowed_to_pope
			years = 10
		}
		
		clr_character_flag = pope_wants_our_law_changed
		
		FROM = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = pope_invest_approve
				who = ROOT
				years = 4
			}
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			FROM = { character_event = { id = 67002 } }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB67001 # Refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		piety = -25
		religion_authority = {
			modifier = ruler_defied_pope
			years = 10
		}
		
		set_character_flag = pope_we_refuse_law_changed
		
		FROM = {
			opinion = {
				modifier = pope_invest_dislike
				who = ROOT
				years = 5
			}
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			FROM = {  character_event = { id = 67003 } }
		}			
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC67001 # Give gold to Pope
		trigger = {
			wealth = 200
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
		
		wealth = -200
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = pope_currently_demanding }
		set_character_flag = pope_respects_our_law
		clr_character_flag = pope_wants_our_law_changed
		hidden_tooltip = {
			FROM = { character_event = { id = 67004  } }
		}		
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD67001 # Impress with Learning
		tooltip_info = learning
		trigger = {
			learning = 16
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		piety = 1
		FROM = { clr_character_flag = pope_currently_demanding }
		set_character_flag = pope_respects_our_law
		clr_character_flag = pope_wants_our_law_changed
		hidden_tooltip = {
			FROM = {  character_event = { id = 67005 } }
		}	
	}
}

#king accepts
character_event = {
	id = 67002
	desc = EVTDESC67002
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA67002
		prestige = 5
	}
}

#king refuses us

	id = 67003
	desc = EVTDESC67003
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA67003
		prestige = -5
		opinion = {
			modifier = pope_invest_dislike
			who = FROM
		}
	}
}

#king bribes us"
